problem.problem_statement: How can rooftop gardens make cities greener?
problem.goalTitle: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

problem.problem_statement: How can we reduce plastic pollution in oceans?
problem.goalTitle: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

problem.problem_statement: How can we prevent wildfires and stop them quickly?
problem.goalTitle: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

problem.problem_statement: How can we use the knowledge of indigenous people to help save forests?
problem.goalTitle: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development

problem.problem_statement: How can schools help protect plants and bees?
problem.goalTitle: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all

problem.problem_statement: How can we better manage freshwater in dry areas?
problem.goalTitle: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

problem.problem_statement: How can we build structures that can withstand floods?
problem.goalTitle: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
